bug.author: lzhao4ever
bug.description: I have input seq0, seq1. In my configure file, only seq0 were used. But seq1 is still in the model and x1 were processed during training and caused size 0 error. The following code illustrate the problem: seq0=data("seq0") seq1=data("seq1") x0=fc(seq0) x1=fc(seq1) y=fc(x0) outputs(y)

comments.comment: close this issue due to inactivity.
